definitions.definition: ( particle physics ) A particle with totally symmetric composite quantum states, which exempts them from the Pauli exclusion principle , and that hence obeys Bose-Einstein statistics . They have integer spin . Among them are many elementary particles, and some (gauge bosons) are known to carry the fundamental forces . Compare fermion .

main_definition: ( particle physics ) A particle with totally symmetric composite quantum states, which exempts them from the Pauli exclusion principle , and that hence obeys Bose-Einstein statistics . They have integer spin . Among them are many elementary particles, and some (gauge bosons) are known to carry the fundamental forces . Compare fermion .
